message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair share while also providing a reasonable amount for Bob.
I'll take a 60/40 split. It's a fair and reasonable offer, considering the initial offer was 30/70 in my favor.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 52.5/47.5 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a fair distribution while adjusting for the decrease in value of the money.
I'll compromise and offer a 55/45 split in my favor. It's a fair adjustment considering the inflation and the previous offers.
